      • getPointAt

        public Vector2 getPointAt(double t)
        Description copied from class: Segment
        Returns the point on this line corresponding to the parameter value. The parameter t is linear, its value is 0 at p1 and 1 at p2. If it is less than 0 or greater than 1, then the returned point will be outside this segment.
        Overrides:
        getPointAt in class Segment
        Parameters:
        t - the parameter value
        Returns:
        p1+(p2-p1)*t

        the perpendicular bisector
